name: The Lion King
full_text: It is time. The soundtrack to Disney's #TheLionKing is here with new songs by @Beyonce, @eltonofficial, @SirTimRice and score composed by @HansZimmer. See The Lion King when it roars into theatres on July 19th. https://t.co/pcaU0XV4qd https://t.co/MgMiHXE5Dn

full_text: I’m Pumbaa in The Lion King and you can buy tickets now if you like to plan wayyyyy ahead. Also here’s a bit of Beyoncé singing: https://t.co/j9hMITANFV

name: The Lion King
full_text: “The Lion King: The Gift,” an album featuring global artists & steeped in the sounds of Africa, produced & curated by @Beyonce Knowles-Carter, will release 7/19. “Spirit,” the single from the album & soundtrack for The Lion King, will be available tonight. https://t.co/IbMpQvJ97U https://t.co/AA7Fxl7hb7
